meanings.definition: The area of land immediately surrounding a house or building, typically enclosed by a fence or wall.
meanings.sent1: The curtilages of the old farmhouse were filled with colorful flowers.
meanings.sent2: The children played in the curtilages of the school during recess.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy dug up the flowers in the curtilages, thinking they were toys.
meanings.sent4: The curtilages of the mansion were like a protective embrace around the grand building.
meanings.sent5: The curtilages, with their tall fences, provided a sense of privacy and security to the residents.

meanings.definition: The grounds or gardens of a property.
meanings.sent1: We had a picnic in the curtilages of the estate, enjoying the peaceful surroundings.
meanings.sent2: The curtilages of the hotel were beautifully landscaped with exotic plants.
meanings.sent3: The wedding guests wandered through the curtilages, admiring the blooming flowers.
meanings.sent4: The curtilages of the historic castle whispered tales of the past to those who strolled through them.
meanings.sent5: The curtilages, with their well-trimmed hedges, added charm to the elegant property.
